questions.question: How does booking a mystery trip work?
questions.answer: Booking is very simple! Choose your package, select your date, fill in your preferences and pay securely online. You'll receive immediate confirmation and 1-2 weeks before departure we reveal your destination.

questions.question: Can I cancel my booking?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel for free up to 14 days before departure and get 100% of your money back. Within 14 days our cancellation terms apply.

questions.question: What if I don't want to go to the revealed destination?
questions.answer: No problem! If you really don't want to go to the revealed destination, you'll get 100% of your money back or you can rebook to another date.

questions.question: Which destinations are possible?
questions.answer: We organize trips to more than 50 stadiums in 15+ European countries. Think Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1 and more!

questions.question: How do I know for sure I won't go to a team I hate?
questions.answer: In your booking form you can specify teams you absolutely don't want to see. We take this 100% into account when selecting your destination.

questions.question: What happens if the match is cancelled?
questions.answer: We always have a backup plan. You'll get tickets for another match in the same city or a full refund if that's not possible.

questions.question: Is my money safe with you?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We are SGR certified (Foundation for the Guarantee Fund for Travel Money) and your money is fully protected. We also offer a 100% money back guarantee.

questions.question: Can I reach you during my trip?
questions.answer: Yes! We have a 24/7 emergency line (+31 20 987 6543) specifically for travelers on the road. You're never alone!

questions.question: Can I book for multiple people?
questions.answer: Of course! You can book for up to 6 people at once. All travelers get the same destination.

questions.question: What's included in the packages?
questions.answer: This varies by package. 'Match Only' contains only tickets, 'Match + Travel' also includes transport, and 'All Inclusive' also includes hotel and meals.

questions.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept iDEAL, credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), bank transfer and PayPal. All payments are 100% secure.

questions.question: Can I extend my trip?
questions.answer: Yes! You can book extra nights or extend your stay. Contact us for the possibilities.

questions.question: How do I get updates about my trip?
questions.answer: You'll receive regular updates via email and have access to your personal dashboard where you can find all information.

questions.question: What if I get sick before my trip?
questions.answer: We recommend travel insurance. If you get sick you can often rebook for free or get your money back through your insurance.

questions.question: Are the hotels of good quality?
questions.answer: Yes! We only work with 4-5 star hotels in the premium package and always ensure clean, safe accommodation.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: YourNextStadium B.V. - Comprehensive Data Protection & Privacy

introduction.title: 1. Introduction & Scope
introduction.company: YourNextStadium B.V. (“Company”, “we”, “us”, or “our”) operates the website yournextstadium.nl and related services (collectively, the “Service”). This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, process, and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable Dutch data protection laws.
introduction.applies: This policy applies to all users of our Service, including visitors, customers, and business partners. By using our Service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Privacy Policy.
introduction.important: Important: This policy is effective as of July 2025. We may update this policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of any material changes through our Service or via email.

definitions.title: 2. Definitions & Legal Framework
definitions.personalDataDesc: Any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person.
definitions.processingDesc: Any operation performed on personal data, including collection, storage, and transmission.
definitions.dataControllerDesc: YourNextStadium B.V., responsible for determining processing purposes and means.
definitions.dataProcessorDesc: Third-party service providers who process data on our behalf.
definitions.gdpr: • General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - EU Regulation 2016/679
definitions.privacyRegs: • European Privacy and Electronic Communications Regulations

collection.title: 3. Data Collection Methods
directItems: • Information provided during account registration and profile creation
• Customer service communications and support requests
automaticItems: • Technical data: IP addresses, browser type, device information
• Usage analytics: page views, session duration, navigation patterns
thirdPartyItems: • Social media platforms (when you connect accounts)

purposes.title: 5. Processing Purposes & Legal Basis
purposes.note: Note: We will only process your personal data for the purposes stated above. If we need to use your data for a new purpose, we will notify you and obtain your consent where required.

sharing.title: 6. Data Sharing & Third Parties
sharing.paymentProcessorsDesc: Stripe, PayPal - for secure payment processing
sharing.cloudServicesDesc: AWS, Google Cloud - for data storage and hosting
sharing.analyticsDesc: Google Analytics, Mixpanel - for usage analysis
sharing.communicationDesc: SendGrid, Twilio - for email and SMS services
sharing.important: Important: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data to third parties for marketing purposes. All data sharing is conducted under strict contractual obligations and data protection agreements.

security.title: 7. Data Security & Protection
technicalItems: • AES-256 encryption for data at rest
• TLS 1.3 encryption for data in transit
• Regular security audits and penetration testing
organizationalItems: • Incident response and breach notification procedures
security.certification: Certification: We maintain ISO 27001 certification and regularly undergo SOC 2 Type II audits to ensure our security practices meet industry standards.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention & Deletion
retention.deletionProcess: Deletion Process: Upon expiration of retention periods, data is automatically deleted or anonymized. You may request early deletion subject to legal requirements.

rights.title: 9. Your Rights & Controls
rights.accessPortabilityDesc: Request a copy of your data in a portable format
rights.erasureDesc: Request deletion of your personal data
rights.objectionDesc: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
rights.automatedDecisionsDesc: Request human review of automated decisions
rights.contactDPO: To exercise any of these rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer:
rights.responseTimeDesc: Within 30 days (may be extended to 60 days for complex requests)

contact.title: 10. Contact & Complaints
contact.complaintProcess: Complaint Process: If you have concerns about our data processing, we encourage you to contact us first. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Dutch Data Protection Authority (AP) or your local supervisory authority.

notices.title: Important Notices
notices.internationalTransfers: International Transfers: Your data may be transferred to countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA). We ensure adequate protection through Standard Contractual Clauses and adequacy decisions.
notices.childrenPrivacy: Children's Privacy: Our Service is not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16 without parental consent.
notices.cookiesPolicy: Cookies Policy: We use cookies and similar technologies. You can manage your preferences through our Cookie Settings or your browser settings.
notices.updates: Updates: This policy may be updated periodically. We will notify you of material changes via email or through our Service.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: YourNextStadium B.V. - Comprehensive Booking Terms & Service Conditions

introduction.title: 1. General Provisions
introduction.company: These general terms and conditions apply to all agreements between YourNextStadium B.V., established in Amsterdam (hereinafter: “YourNextStadium” or “we”), and the customer (hereinafter: “you” or “the traveler”).
introduction.agreement: By making a booking through our website or other channels, you agree to these terms. We advise you to read these terms carefully before making a booking.
introduction.important: YourNextStadium is affiliated with the Foundation for the Guarantee Fund for Travel Money (SGR). Your money is protected in accordance with the Consumer Rights Act.

process.title: 2.1 Booking Process
items: A booking is established after receipt of your payment and our written confirmation
All prices are per person and include VAT, unless stated otherwise
Bookings are binding and can only be modified or cancelled in accordance with these terms
You are obliged to provide correct and complete information

mystery.title: 3. Mystery Concept
mystery.destination: 3.1 Destination: The exact destination of your trip remains secret until 1-2 weeks before departure. We take into account your stated preferences and dislikes.
mystery.reveal: 3.2 Reveal: The destination is revealed via email and your personal dashboard. You will then receive all travel details, tickets and practical information.
mystery.guarantees: 3.3 Guarantees: We guarantee that your destination meets the booked package and that you will not go to teams/cities that you have explicitly excluded.
mystery.mysteryGuaranteeDesc: Not satisfied with the revealed destination? You can rebook to another date free of charge or get your money back within 24 hours after the reveal.

changes.title: 4.2 Changes
items: Changes are possible until 14 days before departure (€25 change costs)
Name changes are free until 7 days before departure
Date changes are subject to availability

travel.title: 5. Travel Conditions
travel.documents: 5.1 Documents: You are responsible for valid travel documents (passport/ID). Additional documents may be required for travel outside the EU.
travel.health: 5.2 Health: You must be physically and mentally capable of undertaking the trip. In case of doubt, we advise seeking medical advice.
travel.behavior: 5.3 Behavior: You must comply with local laws and customs. Inappropriate behavior may result in exclusion from the trip without right to refund.
travel.insurance: 5.4 Insurance: We strongly advise taking out travel insurance. YourNextStadium is not liable for costs due to illness, accident or other unforeseen circumstances.

liability.title: 6. Liability
liability.ourLiability: 6.1 Our liability: YourNextStadium is liable for the proper execution of the booked services. Our liability is limited to the travel sum.
liability.forceMajeure: 6.2 Force majeure: We are not liable for damage due to force majeure, such as natural disasters, strikes, terrorism, pandemics or government measures.
liability.thirdParties: 6.3 Third parties: For services of third parties (hotels, carriers, stadiums) their own terms apply. We mediate in problems but are not primarily liable.
liability.sgrGuaranteeDesc: YourNextStadium is affiliated with SGR (Foundation for the Guarantee Fund for Travel Money). Your money is protected in case of bankruptcy. SGR number: 4321.

complaints.title: 7. Complaints and Disputes
complaints.procedure: 7.1 Complaint procedure: Complaints must be submitted in writing to our customer service within 14 days after return.
complaints.disputes: 7.2 Disputes committee: For unresolved disputes, you can contact the Travel Disputes Committee (www.degeschillencommissie.nl).
complaints.applicableLaw: 7.3 Applicable law: Dutch law applies to this agreement. Disputes are submitted to the competent court in Amsterdam.
